ygData.subject: RE: Boots, time, and mana song
ygData.msgSnippet: Inferno Goblin Captain (Around lv 30) Location : Coming out the secret passage where the efreeti is, hang a right through the door with two spawns, on the
ygData.messageBody:
Inferno Goblin Captain (Around lv 30)

Location : Coming out the secret passage where the efreeti is, hang a right
through the door with two spawns, on the right is another door, through
that, follow the passage to a door with a room of 4 doors and 2 spawns (Plus
a wanderer) continue straight accross to another room with 2 spawns. The
Captain is the rare of one of those two spawns.

Common Drop : Charred Gauntlets (AC7, +3dex, +5int, BRD, CLR, PAL, SHD, WAR)
Rare Drop : Charred Boots (AC6, +3agi, +5vs fire, +5vs poison, BRD, CLR,
PAL, SHD, WAR)


Draelon Stormsong

-----Original Message-----
From: Ronnie Roads [mailto:rkroads@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 5:29 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Boots, time, and mana song


From: Ronnie Roads <rkroads@...>

Hmmm, a nice lady in my guild did the Watchman boot quest and said they were
black
plate, then a person here said they look like silver plate. I guess the
best
confirmation is my own eyes =).

On a related note, given that the Watchman boot quest has to be started on a
particular day/time in game, I need to remind myself of the conversion from
Earth to
Norrathian time. Last time I payed a lot of attention was trying to predict
the
time of sunrise in North Karana so as to schedule a wedding =). Notice that
Norrath
doesn't rotate on its axis hehe.

I looked around for information on charred boots and was kind of surprised
not to
find any. I would guess they drop in Sol A based on the name and the
increase to
fire reist. Could someone help me out here please?

Regarding mana song: have we chatted about its effect on casting cost?
Anyone done
tests?


//Maravana Vireo
//50th Bard of the Jus Divinum
//Mithaniel Marr
